overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains an active presence across Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, focusing on research, announcements, and opportunities in the field of computational social science and disinformation studies. LinkedIn boasts the largest following and generally higher engagement per post, while Bluesky and Mastodon serve as platforms for disseminating research findings and participating in academic discussions. Overall engagement is respectable given the focused niche audience.

contentThemes.description: Sharing new publications, research findings, and grant awards.
Discussions and resources related to computational methods in social science research.
Content focused on detecting and analyzing disinformation campaigns.
Advertising postdoctoral positions and research opportunities.

recommendations: Tailor content to each platform's audience: Share professional updates and job postings on LinkedIn, and research findings/discussions on Bluesky and Mastodon.
Increase interactive content: Pose questions, run polls, or create threads to encourage more engagement.
Use relevant hashtags consistently to increase discoverability, particularly on Bluesky and Mastodon.

platformInsights.bluesky: Bluesky is effective for sharing research publications and engaging in discussions related to coordinated inauthentic behavior.
platformInsights.mastodon: Mastodon serves as a platform for disseminating research tools and participating in discussions about methodological approaches.
platformInsights.linkedin: LinkedIn is the strongest platform for professional networking, announcing grants, and recruiting postdoctoral researchers.
